title: Balloonatic
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
You came
You came, you scorched her
You came, unstained you adore her
[Chorus]
United again
Like separated twins
United again
[Verse 2]
You
You will remember
She knows, she knows you want her
[Chorus]
United again
Like separated twins
United again
United again
Like separated twins
You can be...
[Outro]
Come gentle, slowly
Down tonight
